concept.title: TokenLayer
concept.shortdesc: TokenLayer connects the applications (websites) and blockchain

conbody.p: TokenLayer sits between Blockchain and Websites to provide token functions with the level of trust provided by the blockchain and the user experience of a website.

section.title: For the web
section.p: For a website, a TokenLayer is like a rail that you can "slot-in" blockchain Tokens, similar to how a Paymanet Rail allows a e-commerce site to on-board users of various credit card and payment methods. However, Tokens can provide more important role than just payment. For example, a Car Token allows a car owner to securely authorise your website to find a new rental customer of the car and to give that customer direct access to the car door. section.title: For the Token Issuers
section.p: For a Token Issuer, a TokenLayer can be considered as a pre-packaged distribution channel to make your tokens available to all websites that also uses a TokenLayer. This is vital to token issuer's business model whcih is directly affected by the token's reach. A TokenLayer solution supports various transaction security features and a packaged user experience. For example, if you issue Car Token to car owners, they will be able to use it on websites to rent their cars out, or access car status and services with that token.

section.title: A TokenLayer is both a standardisation effort and an infrastructure.
section.p: Speaking of standardisation, take, for example, the process of matching Tokens with Websites that uses them: TokenNegotiation, requires a common conversation channel for the website to check what tokens the user have, and for the user to choose the token to use, prove the token's ownership or other information if needed. Furthermore, the way token invoke each other requires a common expression which benefits from standardisation.

On the infrastructure side, a TokenLayer implementation like TokenScript accesses blockchain data on behalf of the token code (in TokenScript files) and the website, run the necessary cryptographic proofs and mathematical marvels, provides a private and secure environment to run Token Cards, and provide security features to safe guard user's assets.
